p: Several studies have been conducted with promising results in vitro regarding the use of antiviral drugs such as cidofovir, ganciclovir and other antiretroviral drugs (zalzitabine, alovudine, stavudine) but there are not as many validations in vivo [ 48]. Cidofovir has been shown to reduce mortality, but it is related to kidney and ocular toxicity [ 6].
